text: Day ur twalav ara imvebboen seg wAt Isoail, deffir Musa? Mi nnan i nnbi nnsen: "azen a$ d agellid, a nenna$ deg ubrid n Oebbi". Inna: "ma iura fellawen umennu$, day a ppagim a ppenna$em"? Nnan: "ur a$ issefk ara a neqqim ur nepna$ ara, deg ubrid n Oebbi. Ni$ ssuff$en a$ d, nekwni akked tarwa nne$, seg ixxamen nne$". Mi iura fellasen umennu$, wexxoen, siwa drus segsen. Oebbi Issen imednas
